Package com.mygdx.game

package com.mygdx.game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DebugMode
    This class is the Debug Screen for the game.
    DifficultyStorage
    Stores the current difficulty being used.
    FailedScreen
    This class represents the FAILED screen where it will appear when the user fails a level.
    GameScreenLevel1
    GameScreenLevel1 represents the first level of the game.
    GameScreenLevel1.WordList
    Define the WordList class as a static nested class
    GameScreenLevel2
    GameScreenLevel2 represents the second level of the game.
    GameScreenLevel2.WordList
    Define the WordList class as a static nested class
    GameScreenLevel3
    GameScreenLevel3 represents the third level of the game.
    GameScreenLevel3.WordList
    Define the WordList class as a static nested class
    InstructorDashboard
    This screen represents the Instructor Dashboard.
    JSONHandeler
    Custom methods that simplify certain actions for Json.
    LeaderboardScreen
    This class represents the Load Game Screen where the user can load a save file with a nickname.
    LoadGameScreen
    This class represents the Load Game Screen where the user can load a save file with a nickname.
    MainMenu
    MainMenu screen of the game.
    NewGameScreen
    This class represents the New Game Screen where the user can create a new save file with a nickname and difficulty.
    PauseScreen
    Represents the pause screen in the game.
    ResultsScreen
    This creates the screen used for displaying the results after every level.
    Save
    Used to store save data within users.json.
    SaveState
    Used to store save data within users.json.
    SpellQuest
    This class sets up the initial screen and size.
    TutorialScreen
    The tutorial screen for the game, displaying instructions and controls to the player.
    UsernameStorage
    Stores the current username being used.
